trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il valore restituito da un'operazione di confronto del database tra tipi di dati Oracle ed espone i metodi utilizzati per eseguire conversioni di tipi di dati.

trans-unit.source: The key difference between an OracleBoolean structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an OracleBoolean structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: La differenza principale tra una struttura OracleBoolean e standard **booleano** è che, in cui uno standard `Boolean` sono possibili due valori, `true` e `false`, una struttura OracleBoolean ha tre valori possibili, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, o <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>

trans-unit.source: An OracleBoolean structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
trans-unit.target: Struttura OracleBoolean non esegue il mapping a un Oracle `Boolean` del tipo di dati; è esposto come una classe di supporto di praticità.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> da utilizzare come valore iniziale di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure using the specified integer.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura utilizzando il valore integer specificato.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se `value` è 0, il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>è `false`; in caso contrario è `true`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> to be used as the initial value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref> da utilizzare come valore iniziale di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Calcola l'operatore AND bit per bit di due determinati <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> strutture.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato dell'operazione di AND logico, come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: Value of x
trans-unit.target: Valore dix

trans-unit.source: Value of y Result
trans-unit.target: Valore di y risultato

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: Confronta questo <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura a un oggetto specificato e restituisce un'indicazione dei relativi valori.

trans-unit.source: Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi istanza di <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, indipendentemente dal valore, viene considerato maggiore di un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>

trans-unit.source: An object to compare, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare, o un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
trans-unit.target: Numero con segno che indica i valori relativi dell'istanza e valore.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrizione

trans-unit.source: A negative integer
trans-unit.target: Un numero intero negativo

trans-unit.source: This instance is less than value.
trans-unit.target: Questa istanza è minore di value .

trans-unit.source: Zero
trans-unit.target: Zero

trans-unit.source: This instance is equal to value.
trans-unit.target: Questa istanza è uguale a value .

trans-unit.source: A positive integer
trans-unit.target: Un numero intero positivo

trans-unit.source: This instance is greater than value.
trans-unit.target: Questa istanza è maggiore di value .

trans-unit.source: -or- value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: - oppure - value è un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Compares the supplied object parameter to the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Confronta il parametro dell'oggetto fornito per il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if object is an instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> and the two are equal; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto è un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> e due sono uguali; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> strutture per determinare se sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> ovvero <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze sono uguali o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è null, il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>del <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore false che può essere assegnato al <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>proprietà di un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The False field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
trans-unit.target: Il campo False è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>costante per la struttura.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per questa istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash di un intero con segno a 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>è <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A>è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, questa proprietà è ancora `false`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether or not the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure is null.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il valore di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura è null.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> valore della struttura è **Null**, in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indica se l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>è <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A>è <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, questa proprietà è ancora `false`.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if <xref uid="langword_csharp_Value" name="Value" href=""></xref> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine if they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> per determinare se non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> ovvero <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze non sono uguali o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è null, il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>del <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.

trans-unit.source: Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'operazione complemento su fornito <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> strutture.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the supplied <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il complemento a uno di fornito <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> contains a null value the result also is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> contiene un valore null, anche il risultato sarà un valore null.

trans-unit.source: Compares two instances of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> for inequality.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due istanze di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> per stabilirne la disuguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> that is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are not equal or <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> ovvero <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze non sono uguali o <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> se le due istanze sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is null, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> is <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se l'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è null, il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>del <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> è <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Performs a NOT operation on an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'operazione NOT su un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> on which the NOT operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> in cui viene eseguita l'operazione NOT.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> with the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*><xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"></xref> if argument was true, <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"></xref> if argument was null, and <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> con il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True"> </xref> se l'argomento è stato impostato su true, <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null"> </xref> se l'argomento è null, e <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False"> </xref> in caso contrario.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'operazione complemento a uno sulle <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il complemento a uno specificato <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used to test the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> to determine whether it is true.
trans-unit.target: Usato per testare il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>del <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> per determinare se è true.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure to be tested.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura da testare.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il parametro fornito <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> true; in caso contrario <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structures.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'operazione OR bit per bit su due specificato <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> strutture.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> representation of a logical value to its <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.String>rappresentazione di un valore logico per il relativo <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> equivalente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>da convertire.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure containing the parsed value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura che contiene il valore analizzato.

trans-unit.source: Converts the current <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>in una stringa.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the value of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Stringa contenente il valore di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the value is null, the string contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore è null, la stringa contiene un valore null.

trans-unit.source: Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*> property of an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un valore true che può essere assegnato al <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>proprietà di un'istanza di <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean"> </xref> struttura.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value*>

trans-unit.target: Il campo True è un <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>costante per la struttura.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>

trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un'operazione di OR esclusivo bit per bit ai parametri specificati.
